outputs.output_descr:
Project goal: To further support improvement of the institutional, professional and information and technical capacity of the Government to strengthen aid coordination and improve aid effectiveness to most fully implement Busan commitments on effective development cooperation.

Project outputs: SCISPM is able to effectively manage and coordinate foreign aid, using developed AIMS and Global partnership monitoring results

Project goal: Increasing the effectiveness of the National Development Strategy and Living Standards Improvement Strategy via a sustainable system of NDS/LSIS resource provision system utilising better quantitative indicators of progress.

Project outputs: The main output will be a strengthened/built capacity of government authorities at national and local levels to implement democratic governance practices and effectively and strategically plan, finance and implement initiatives.

project_descr: Support to Effective National Aid Coordination and Monitoring (2013 - 2015)
project_title: Effective National Aid Coordination and Monitoring
